esmCommand.name: grpSearchDeviceNamesInTree
esmCommand.description: Searches the device tree for devices/groups/clients that match the name specified.

esmCommand.name: qryClose
esmCommand.description: Closes the query results, must be called after a query's results have been processed. If no exception is thrown, the close operation completed normally.

esmCommand.name: qryDeleteAlertFlowData
esmCommand.description: Deletes one or more events or flows.

esmCommand.name: qryExecute
esmCommand.description: Execute a query against the database.

esmCommand.name: qryExecuteDetail
esmCommand.description: Execute a standard detail (non-grouped) query.

esmCommand.name: qryExecuteGrouped
esmCommand.description: Execute a grouped query on a field. The configuration's filter is required. In addition, a filter of IPSID is required for the query to be valid.

esmCommand.name: qryGetCorrEventDataForID
esmCommand.description: Get the source events and flows for a given correlated event ID

esmCommand.name: qryGetFilterFields
esmCommand.description: Get all fields that can be used in query filters, with type information for each field.

esmCommand.name: qryGetFilterSet
esmCommand.description: Returns a filter set by id.

esmCommand.name: qryGetFilterSetList
esmCommand.description: This method returns all the folder structure of a filterSet

esmCommand.name: qryGetIocData
esmCommand.description: Gets all relevant data about a specific IOC.

esmCommand.name: qryGetResults
esmCommand.description: Get the results for a query.

esmCommand.name: qryGetSelectFields
esmCommand.description: Get the fields available for selecting in queries. The groupType can be used to filter the fields to only ones that can be used to group results in a particular way. For example, if you want all fields that can be grouped to count the number of events per group, the groupType should be COUNT. If not provided, it is equivalent to passing NO_GROUP which returns all available select fields regardless of whether they can be used in grouped queries. This is useful for getting available fields for detail queries. (qryExecuteDetail)

esmCommand.name: qryGetStatus
esmCommand.description: Get the status for a query that has been executed.

esmCommand.name: qryGetTrendTimeSlice
esmCommand.description: Qry get trend time slice.

esmCommand.name: qryGetWmiTypes
esmCommand.description: Get a list of WMI Types

esmCommand.name: qryMarkAsReviewed
esmCommand.description: Mark an event(s) as reviewed.

esmCommand.name: qrySaveFilterSet
esmCommand.description: Save a new FilterSet or update it

esmCommand.name: rskGetCorrelationTriggerInfo
esmCommand.description: Return Esm Correlation Trigger Info

esmCommand.name: runActiveResponseSearch
esmCommand.description: Execute a ActiveResponse search and return the results

esmCommand.name: sysAddWatchlist
esmCommand.description: Add a watchlist to the system.

esmCommand.name: sysAddWatchlistValues
esmCommand.description: Add values to a watchlist. This call is not supported for hidden watchlists, for example GTI.

esmCommand.name: sysCanEditItems
esmCommand.description: Gets the items that can or can't be edited

esmCommand.name: sysEditWatchlist
esmCommand.description: Edit properties of a watchlist. (Watchlist Type will not be modified) This call is not supported for hidden watchlists, for example GTI.

esmCommand.name: sysGetAllChanges
esmCommand.description: Returns all changes since the last check.

esmCommand.name: sysGetDataAllocation
esmCommand.description: Returns the database allocation information for index and data drives.

esmCommand.name: sysGetFilterFieldsList
esmCommand.description: This method returns the user filter list.

esmCommand.name: sysGetMaxDays
esmCommand.description: Get the number of days that events and flows are stored and the time frame when new events and flows may be added to the database.

esmCommand.name: sysGetSelectProfileList
esmCommand.description: Returns the selected profile type list

esmCommand.name: sysGetSysInfo
esmCommand.description: This method returns all the overview system information.

esmCommand.name: sysGetWatchlistDetails
esmCommand.description: Get detailed information about a watchlist.

esmCommand.name: sysGetWatchlistFields
esmCommand.description: Get watchlist fields/types.

esmCommand.name: sysGetWatchlistValues
esmCommand.description: Read the content of a watchlist value file. Note that the EsmFileData object will contain information on how many bytes were read, as well as the total size of the file. The size of the data returned may be less than count, depending on the amount of file data available. Note that the watchlist file property on EsmWatchlistDetails is used as a parameter to this call. The file will contain the values as they existed when the call to sysGetWatchlistDetails was made. If subsequent changes were made to the watchlist after getting the details, another EsmWatchlistDetails object should be obtained by calling sysGetWatchlistDetails before using its EsmWatchlistFile object to retrieve the updated list of watchlist values. This call is not supported for hidden watchlists, for example GTI.

esmCommand.name: sysGetWatchlists
esmCommand.description: Return basic information on all watchlists in the system

esmCommand.name: sysRemoveWatchlist
esmCommand.description: Remove watchlist/s from the system. This call is not supported for hidden watchlists, for example GTI.

esmCommand.name: sysRemoveWatchlistValues
esmCommand.description: Remove values from a watchlist. This call is not supported for hidden watchlists, for example GTI.

esmCommand.name: userAddUser

esmCommand.name: userDeleteAccessGroup

esmCommand.description: Delete a user from the system.

esmCommand.name: userEditAccessGroup
esmCommand.description: Edit properties of an access group.

esmCommand.name: userEditUser
esmCommand.description: Used by the master user to update information about another user.

esmCommand.name: userGetAccessGroupDetail
esmCommand.description: Get extended information about an access group.

esmCommand.name: userGetAccessGroupList
esmCommand.description: Get all user access groups defined in the system.

esmCommand.name: userGetRightsList
esmCommand.description: Get all rights defined in the system.

esmCommand.name: userGetTimeZones
esmCommand.description: Get a list of timezones this system recognizes

esmCommand.name: userGetUserList
esmCommand.description: Get a list of all users.

esmCommand.name: userGetUserRights
esmCommand.description: Get all rights defined for the current user.

esmCommand.name: userGetUserTimeFrame
esmCommand.description: User time frame

esmCommand.name: userLogout
esmCommand.description: Log the user out of their SIEM session

esmCommand.name: userModifyUser
esmCommand.description: Changes the user password

esmCommand.name: userSetAutoGetPacket
esmCommand.description: This function sets the new state of the Auto-Get Packet for the current user.

esmCommand.name: zoneAddSubZone
esmCommand.description: Add a new subzone under a zone

esmCommand.name: zoneAddZone
esmCommand.description: Create a new zone.

esmCommand.name: zoneDeleteSubZone
esmCommand.description: Delete the sub zone

esmCommand.name: zoneDeleteZone
esmCommand.description: Delete the zone

esmCommand.name: zoneEditSubZone
esmCommand.description: Edit the given sub zone. Note that ID must be set to an existing sub zone for this to work properly. The ID value will be set if the zone was gotten from zoneGetSubZone().

esmCommand.name: zoneEditZone
esmCommand.description: Edit the given zone. Note that ID must be set to an existing zone for this to work properly. The ID value will be set if the zone was gotten from zoneGetZone().

esmCommand.name: zoneGetSubZone
esmCommand.description: Get detailed information on a sub zone

esmCommand.name: zoneGetTopLevelZones
esmCommand.description: Gets the top level zones

esmCommand.name: zoneGetZone
esmCommand.description: Get extended detail on a zone.

esmCommand.name: zoneGetZoneTree
esmCommand.description: Get the full tree of zones defined in the ESM.
